metadata.title: CVE-2023-1636 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in OpenStack Barbican containers. Thisvulnerability is only applicable to deployments that utilize an all-in-oneconfiguration. Barbican containers share the same CGROUP, USER, and NETnamespace with the host system and other OpenStack services. If any serviceis compromised, it could gain access to the data transmitted to and fromBarbican.

criterions.comment: barbican: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
